entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow or rain. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 60 percent chance of snow this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM MDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
